targets.expr: sum by (component)(thanos_status{clusterName=~"$cluster_name"})

sum(kube_pod_container_info{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$sidecar_namespace", container=~"thanos-sidecar.*"}) / count(kube_pod_container_info{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$sidecar_namespace", container=~"thanos-sidecar.*"})
sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", code=~"3.."}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", code=~"4.."}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, code) (rate(http_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, code) (rate(grpc_client_msg_sent_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, code) (rate(grpc_client_msg_received_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, code) (rate(grpc_server_msg_sent_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, code) (rate(grpc_server_msg_received_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$sidecar_namespace", pod=~"$sidecar_pod", grpc_type="unary"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss", container="thanos-sidecar.*", grpc_type="unary"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", container=~"thanos-sidecar.*", grpc_type="unary"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", container=~"thanos-sidecar.*", grpc_type="unary"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Latency 99th Percentile

targets.expr: sum by (job, handler) (rate(http_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", handler="query_range", code=~"2.."}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, handler) (rate(http_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", handler="query_range", code=~"3.."}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, handler) (rate(http_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", handler="query_range", code=~"4.."}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by (job, handler) (rate(http_requests_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", handler="query_range", code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job", handler="query_range"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Latency 99th Percentile

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"thanos-.*storegateway", grpc_type="unary"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",job=~"thanos-.*storegateway.*", grpc_type="unary"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"thanos-.*storegateway.*", grpc_type="unary"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: gRPC (Unary) Errors

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket by compaction group.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Compaction Rate

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket by compaction group.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_failures_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_total{clusterName=~"$cluster_name", namespace=~"$thanos_namespace", job=~"$thanos_job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Compaction Errors
